org.drooms.api

Class Collectible

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drooms.api.Collectible

  • public class Collectible
extends Object
    Represents an item that occasionally pops up on the Playground. When a worm's head reaches this item, the Player in question will be rewarded by a specific amount of points. No two instances ever Object.equals(Object).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Collectible(int points)
      Construct an item that never expires.
      Collectible(int points, int expiresInTurn)
      Construct the item.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean expires()
      Whether or not this item will disappear from the Playground at some point in time.
      int expiresInTurn()
      The number of the turn at the beginning of which this item will disappear from the Playground.
      int getPoints()
      Number of points to award to Player in case a worm successfully reaches the item.
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Collectible

        public Collectible(int points)
        Construct an item that never expires.
        Parameters:
        points - How many points to award. Must be > 0.

      • Collectible

        public Collectible(int points,
           int expiresInTurn)
        Construct the item.
        Parameters:
        points - How many points to award. Must be > 0.
        expiresInTurn - At which turn the item expires. Must be > 0.

    • Method Detail

      • expires

        public boolean expires()
        Whether or not this item will disappear from the Playground at some point in time.
        Returns:
        True if the item will disappear, false if it stays indefinitely.

      • expiresInTurn

        public int expiresInTurn()
        The number of the turn at the beginning of which this item will disappear from the Playground.
        Returns:
        A number >= 0 when expires() is true, -1 otherwise.

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints()
        Number of points to award to Player in case a worm successfully reaches the item.
        Returns:
        A positive number.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
